step.cmd: Center the carriage of the typewriter.
Pick up the typewriter and tilt the front end of the machine upwards approximately 2 to 3 inches.
Slowly insert the typewriter into the case, ensuring that the double-pronged cleat at the back of the case slides into the two slots on the back of the machine.
Push the front of the machine down so that it latches onto the front cleat.
Check to ensure that the machine is secure by lifting the front end of the typewriter. If it is secure, it will not lift from the case.
